title: Detox Support - Collaborative Natural Health Partners
description: Detox Support by Apple A Day contains a variety of nutrients to support dietary needs.* The macro- and micronutrients in this product support the energy production needed for detoxification.* Nutrients from this product also support antioxidant activity while allowing for a healthy response to inflammation.* *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent disease.
